name: Full-Stack Web Developer
description:
Maintain, and contribute to the future direction of, the convention website and its systems.
Work with design-minded team members to ensure the site approachability, accessibility, and theming.
Implement updates in the months leading up to the con, and help with bug fixes during the con should they arise.
Collaborate with other team and staff members to keep things running smoothly.

name: Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Maintain the cloud and non-cloud infrastructure that powers the convention.
Monitor systems for uptime and performance, especially during registration and con days.
Troubleshoot issues as they arise.
Work in a team of peers in a IaC and documentation-first approach.

name: HR Officer
description: You will be supporting the HR department with both the administrative and the people-focused side of recruitment and staff support. You will also set up and streamline HR processes (recruitment, onboarding, check-ins, exit), maintaining documentation, and being a warm and reliable point of contact for staff members via email, chat, and video calls.

name: Decoration Head
description: This person will help with leading anything related to decorations, from coming up to ideas to getting all the decorations to the location.

name: Steward
description:
During the convention you will work closely with other stewards, including the head and deputy. We are active the whole convention and split our time in shifts. Our main tasks are:

- Badge control at the entrance.

- Answering attendee questions and needs: information about the convention, first aid needs, struggles with distress or conflicts.

- Keeping the convention space safe by monitoring the entrance of the Fursuit Lounge, the Dealer’s Den and some key events.

- Responding to incidents and other unexpected events.

- Helping other departments during setup and teardown and whenever they need extra hands.

name: Multimedia Designer
description: Design & edit visuals for multimedia posts & announcements.

name: Stewards & Safety Head
description:
Provide a Safe environment for events and attendees. 
Provide help to attendees who ask questions.
React quick and smooth in emergencies

name: Money runner
description: Dedicate time during the convention to provide the bar with money if needed, and take away money from the bar if it exceeds a certain amount. These runs happen on specific timestamps
